Suggestions for Improvement:

Cleaniness: Make sure to keep the facilities clean and up to standards to maintain the positive customer experience.

Amenities: Consider updating the current amenities to include more recent trends and give customers more options.

Location: Make sure the area is safe and close to other attractions that customers may be interested in.

Services: Ensure that all employees are properly trained and always offering excellent service. 

General: Improve customer service and communication to ensure that customers have a positive experience.

Value: Offer more competitive prices and discounts for customers to receive the best value for their money.
